name: Cooking Playtime: Tasty Street
description:
Cooking Playtime: Tasty street - the most addicting cooking time management games available. In this free and entertaining journey, you may now spread the culinary fever all over the world.

→ Let’s become frenzied chefs, masters of the culinary arts. You may prepare delectable dishes, travel across places, embark on diverse food culture trips, and establish your own trendy kitchen empire.

In your cooking diary and culinary story, you serve a variety of famous dishes such as Sushi, Dimsum, … as well as making tea, preparing ice cream, many Asian foods, burgers, seafood, baking cupcakes, making coffee, and a variety of fast food... and discovering countless hidden recipes in your excellent restaurants.

Play anytime and anywhere you want - No internet connection is needed after the initial setup. Let's play this free cookery game at your leisure. The journey is Fantastic.

OUTSTANDING FEATURE:
⌲ Serve hundreds of one-of-a-kind culinary dishes from throughout the world. In this beautiful tour, you will see all of the major streets.
⌲ Get a true sense of cooking in the insane kitchen - the finest restaurant ever. You can do anything in your culinary experience: boil, fry, steam, grill... and even if you don't, you'll acquire heaps of cooking skills and new tasty recipes you've never tried before.
⌲ Improve ingredients to introduce more innovative cuisines to crazed eaters.
⌲ Keep up with rush hour by correctly managing your time and updating your kitchen appliances.
⌲ Cook up awesome combinations, collect large bonuses, and you'll be the winner after completing all of the hard tasks in this cooking craziness voyage.

⇨ Be the top of the best at your luxury restaurant!

HOW TO PLAY?
‣ Collect enough keys to unlock more eateries.
‣ Prepare and serve over 300 delicious dinners.
‣ Improve your ingredients and kitchen equipment.
‣ Increase your revenue by providing more consumers in less time.
‣ Create a variety of combinations to earn more money and tips from clients.
‣ Use item packs to increase your cooking strength and choked speed.
‣ Make an effort not to squander or overcook any food.

↺ TIPS
• Completing culinary goals with Magical Boost then instantly well-cooked
• Special Pans assist you in ensuring that your food is never overdone.
• Customers are offered meals promptly using Cook Helper
• Use Double Coin to boost your profits and be rich.

Now, do everything you can and give it a try in this chophouse. Get the restaurants back to business.
Chef, a lot of luck today!

Download Tasty Street for free right now ⇪
